## parseVSCodeSettings() function

Read and parse VS Code family settings.json.

Attempts to read settings from the detected editor's config directory, with fallback paths for other VS Code family editors. Extracts terminal color customizations from workbench.colorCustomizations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function parseVSCodeSettings(info: VSCodeFamilyInfo): ParsedTerminalColors | null;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

info


</td><td>

[VSCodeFamilyInfo](./chromaterm.vscodefamilyinfo.md)


</td><td>

VS Code family editor information from detectVSCodeFamily


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ParsedTerminalColors](./chromaterm.parsedterminalcolors.md) \| null

Parsed terminal colors, or null if no settings file found or no colors configured
